org_desc:
www.peninsulasymphony.org

The mission of the Peninsula Symphony is to enrich the lives of people in our community with inspiring, innovative, high-quality musical presentations at affordable prices, and to promote music education through engaging programs for children and adults.
description:
Peninsula Symphony invites you to join us for a night out at the opera. With a musical program featuring 17 - yes, you read that correctly, 17 - different pieces, this concert will have something for everyone, whether you are an opera novice or aficionado!

Our evening of "Great Moments in Opera" will highlight two of the Bay Area's favorite opera stars, Heidi Moss and Eugene Brancoveanu, and will also feature the 140-voice Stanford Symphonic Chorus. It will be an exhilirating evening of vocal and orchestral showpieces, to say the least!

A young professional VIP ticket grants you access to our informative pre-concert lecture, reserved seating to the performance, and a post-concert reception with food, wine and the exclusive opportunity to meet Peninsula Symphony musicians and Conductor Mitchell Sardou Klein. With a $60 value at the price of $25, we only have limited tickets available, so get them before they're gone! 

 

Event schedule:

7:00-7:30 pm  Pre-concert lecture by Assistant Conductor Jessica Bejarano
8:00-10:00 pm  "Great Moments in Opera" performance
10:00-11:00 pm  Post-concert reception (food and wine provided) with Peninsula Symphony musicians and Conductor Mitchell Sardou Klein

 

For more information about Peninsula Symphony, please visit us at peninsulasymphony.org

You can also connect with us on our social media channels!

Facebook: facebook.com/peninsula.symphony
Twitter: twitter.com/peninsulasymph
YouTube: youtube.com/peninsulasymph
Flickr: flickr.com/peninsulasymphony
name: Peninsula Symphony - Night Out at the Opera
